field.label: Reverse Proxy
field.help: Select a Domain, to which this Subdomain should be added.

field.label: From Subdomain
field.help: Enter the subdomain name (e.g., 'foo.example.com' if your wildcard domain is '*.example.com').

field.label: From Port
field.help: Enter the port number for this Subdomain reverse proxy source (e.g., '8000').

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description for this Subdomain entry.
